channel.title: 1 error plz help
channel.description:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 6000000 at client.addItem(client.java:13690) at client.WC(client.java:8352) at client.process(client.java:15322) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:47)
I NEED HELP PLZ! It says this when im running the server...I don't know how to fix...

item.title: 1 error plz help

item.description:
@tr3v0r wrote:

Nvm, I fixed it was a tree that was suppost to give 6m but it had “,1” after “6000000”…

item.title: 1 error plz help
item.dc:creator: @mrdek11 mrdek11
item.description:
@mrdek11 wrote:

Search client.java for “60000000”, that number is too big for the server to handle. Bring it down a bit. What exactly is that number? An item? Whatever it is, the error is telling you the number is too big.

Read full topic
